info.brief_description: When you're family finds you've shrunk, things take an amazing, outrageous turn.
info.description:
You begin your tale as one of any family member. From there, you explore your house and get caught up in various sexual hijinks.

Now, I like the idea of the point of view character enjoying what's happening, so we'll just have to keep those options open for those who are more into non-con.

Feel free to add as you wish, but please put some effort into your spelling and grammar. Vore, incest, masturbation, pretty much anything goes, get creative. Gay and lesbian action is just as encouraged as heterosexual.

Introduce friends to the family, bring in the extended family, add step-siblings or step-parents, get everyone involved!

Have fun!
